title: Deployment - Configure New Firewall
description: As part of a firewall replacement project, a technician needs to configure the new firewall.

tasks.description: Review the discovery documentation to understand all the required firewall rules, VPN tunnels, and network segments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has a complete list of configuration requirements.

tasks.description: Configure the new firewall with all the required settings in a staging environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The firewall is fully configured before being deployed.

tasks.description: Save the final configuration and prepare for the physical installation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The configuration is backed up and ready for deployment.
